name: Notification
content:
REGISTERED No.1" - 302 
L.-7646 
*mzstgEncigeol 4  
EXTRAORDINARY 
PUBLISHED BY AUTHORITY 
ISLAMABAD, WEDNESDAY, SEPTEMBER 9, 2015 
PART II 
Statutory Notifications (S.R.0.) 
GOVERNMENT OF PAKISTAN 
MINISTRY OF LAW, JUSTICE AND HUMAN RIGHTS 
NOTIFICATION 
Islamabad, the 131h August, 2015 
S. R. 0. 922(I)/2015.—In exercise of the powers conferred by 
sub-section (2) of section 2 of the Central Law Officers Ordinance, 1970 (VII of 
1970), the President of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan is pleased to direct that 
in the Additional Attorney-General, Deputy Attorney-General and Standing 
Counsel (Terms and Conditions) Rules, 2011, the following further amendments 
shall be made and shall be deemed to have been so made with immediate effect, 
namely:— 
In the aforesaid Rules, in rule 2,— 
(1) in clause (a), for sub-clause (iv), the following shall be substituted, 
namely:- 
(3251) 
Price : Rs. 2.00 11523(2015)/Ex. Gaz.1 
3252 	THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., SEPT. 9, 2015 	[PART II 	
"(iv) monthly monetization of transport 	Rs. 70,000 
(all inclusive);"; and 
(2) in clause (c) for sub-clause (ii), the following shall be 
substituted, namely:— 	
(ii) monthly monetization of transport 	Rs. 30,000 
(all inclusive);". 
[No. F. 7(5)/2014-A.V111 
JUSTICE (R) 
MUHAMMAD RAZA KHAN, 
Secretary. 
PRINTED BY THE MANAGER, PRINTING CORPORATION OF PAKISTAN PRESS, ISLAMABAD. 
PUBLISHED BY THE DEPUTY CONTROLLER, STATIONERY AND FORMS, UNIVERSITY ROAD, KARACHI.
